tool.name: Glimmer3
tool.command:
#import tempfile, os #set $temp = tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile( delete=False ) #silent $temp.close() #set $temp = $temp.name
glimmer3 --max_olap $max_olap --gene_len $gene_len --threshold $threshold #if float( str($gc_percent) ) > 0.0: --gc_percent $gc_percent #end if
#if $stop_codon_opts.stop_codon_opts_selector == "gb": --trans_table "${stop_codon_opts.genbank_gencode}" #else: --stop_codons "${stop_codon_opts.stop_codons}" #end if
--start_codons $start_codons
$linear $no_indep $extend $seq_input $icm_input $temp 2>&1;
## convert prediction to FASTA sequences $__tool_directory__/glimmer2seq.py $temp".predict" $seq_input $genes_output;
#if $report: mv $temp".predict" $report_output; #else: rm $temp".predict"; #end if
#if $detailed_report: mv $temp".detail" $detailed_output; #else: rm $temp".detail"; #end if
rm $temp

param.name: max_olap
param.label: Set maximum overlap length
param.help: Overlaps this short or shorter are ignored.

param.name: gene_len
param.label: Set the minimum gene length to n nucleotides
param.hrlp: This does not include the bases in the stop codon.

param.name: threshold
param.label: Set threshold score for calling as gene
param.help: If the in-frame score >= N, then the region is given a number and considered a potential gene.

param.name: gc_percent
param.label: Set the GC percentage of the independent model, i.e., the model of intergenic sequence
param.help: If 0.0 specified, the GC percentage will be counted from the input file.

param.name: linear
param.label: Assume linear rather than circular genome, i.e., no wraparound

param.name: no_indep
param.label: Donâ€™t use the independent probability score column at all
param.help: Using this option will produce more short gene predictions.

param.name: extend
param.label: Also score orfs that extend off the end of the sequence(s)

param.name: start_codons
param.label: Specify start codons as a comma-separated list

param.name: genbank_gencode
param.label: Use Genbank translation table to specify stop codons
param.option: 4. Mold, Protozoan, and Coelenterate Mitochondrial Code and the Mycoplasma/Spiroplasma Code
6. Ciliate, Dasycladacean and Hexamita Nuclear Code

param.name: stop_codons
param.label: Specify stop codons as a comma-separated list

param.name: report
param.label: Report the classic glimmer table output

param.name: detailed_report
param.label: Output a detailed gene prediction report as separate file

tool.help:
**What it does**
This is the main program that makes gene predictions based on an interpolated context model (ICM).
The ICM can be generated with extracted CDS from related organisms (ICM builder). If you can't generate an ICM model you can use the non knowlegde-based Glimmer with a de novo prediction.
**Input**
- Interpolated context model (ICM): Use the 'Glimmer ICM builder' tool to create one - Genome Sequence in FASTA format
**Output**
- FASTA file with predicted proteins - Glimmer prediction file (optional)
**Example**
